column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We basically order the same thing every visit - the Lou's salad
column3: and the Malnati Chicago Classic pizza
column4: yum. Certain locations also serve calamari which is very good
column5: but it's not available at all locations. I've never had a bad salad or pizza from any of their locations
column6: and the service is typically friendly and decent.
